Button.TooltipReference: If checked, the game will force your character to duck into small spaces.
If checked, moving forward will automatically make your character stand when sitting.
If checked, tells will appear in a new chat window.

Button.Text: Allow UI Right Click Context Menus

Button.TooltipReference: If checked, automatically enable /afk when the keyboard is inactive.
If checked, automatically disable /afk when the keyboard is active.
If checked, kick requests from alternate logins will automatically be accepted.
If checked, group members will automatically have consent to /corpsedrag.
If checked, guild members will automatically have consent to /corpsedrag.
If checked, raid members will automatically have consent to /corpsedrag.
If checked, Legends of Norrath challenges will automatically be declined.
If checked, characters will automatically join general chat channels.
If checked, mercenaries will automatically set /stance passive the next time upkeep is charged with /afk active.
If checked, logging out will automatically turn off personal tribute.
If checked, mouse clicks will pass through mercenaries.
If checked, mouse clicks will pass through pets.
If checked, mouse clicks will pass through your character.
If checked, AA purchases will require confirmation.
Toggle whether you want to receive a confirmation window when selling a bag. Note that it will not prompt if you are selling the contents of a bag containing another bag.
Toggle whether you want to receive a confirmation window when selling the contents of a bag.
If checked, destroying items will require confirmation.
If checked, LDoN adventure point purchases will require confirmation.
If checked, Loot All will require confirmation.
If checked, Mercenary dismissal will require confirmation.
If checked, offline trader mode will require confirmation.
If checked, raid invites will require confirmation.
If checked, item placement will default to cursor mode.
If checked, the UI will be displayed during item placement.
If checked, the real estate overlay will be displayed during item placement.

Button.Text: Open Tradeskill Container with CTRL-Right Click

Button.TooltipReference: If checked, help text will be displayed when left clicking a target.
If checked, pet owner names will be displayed.
If checked, UI window first use help dialogues will be displayed.
Copy a window layout from any stored layout over the current layout.
Some models adjust their detail depending on their distance from you.
If checked, a colored ring will be displayed around targets.
If checked, your character's helm will be displayed.
If checked, target health percentages will be displayed.
If checked, buff counters will be displayed on buff icons.
If checked, buff limit uses will be displayed on buff icons.
If checked, buff timers will be displayed on buff icons.
If checked, song counters will be displayed on song icons.
If checked, song limit uses will be displayed on song icons.
If checked, song timers will be displayed on song icons.
If checked, mercenary names will be displayed.
If checked, mercenary owner names will be displayed.
If checked, NPC names will be displayed.
If checked, player character names will be displayed.
If checked, pet names will be displayed.
If checked, pet owner names will be displayed.

Combobox.TooltipReference: Toggles the visibility of Hero's Forge armor. If None is selected, no one will appear in new armor.

Button.TooltipReference: Select your screen's resolution, color, and refresh rate settings.
Toggle this to enable or disable zoom camera turning.
Toggle this to swap the mouse's left and right buttons.

Button.Text: Ask for confirmation before deleting an address book entry.
Notify me in the chat window when new mail arrives.
Play a sound when new mail arrives.

Button.TooltipReference: A diagnostic tool to aid in setup.
Save changes to the prefix name used with Facebook.
Save changes to the prefix name used with Twitter.
